New York Bureau of Legal Advice Records
Series VI: Press Releases and Newspaper Clippings
Series VI: Press Releases and Newspaper Clippings
Most of the clippings collected here come from articles in The Call or The New York Times. Topics range from free speech issues to amnesty of conscientious objectors to deportation legislation.
